title: FPS DROPS TO LESS THAN 6!!
body:
Playing on a mid 2015 MacBook pro:
16GB Ram
2.8GHz intel core i7 processor
AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2048MB Graphic card.  

When playing a game, i will begin with 160fps running highest graphics and ping at 28. 

About 11-12 minutes into the game my frame rate begins to drop, down to about 30-60 at this point. 

A few minutes later my frames drop even further to 6 and below making the game unplayable. They have even gone to 0 fps. ZERO FRAMES PER SECOND.

This is not an issue with my laptop it is high spec. if i terminated the game and reconnected i will be back up to 160fps but as time lapses it happens again!! 

This makes the game virtually unplayable - i have ran full repair a few times and no difference.

HELP

replies.body: Your pc may just have some general wear and tear and could use a tune up.  Run through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to get your fps back in shape.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I will look into this thank you, although i wouldn't really expect any issue with my mac as it is a high spec'd machine that is only really used for my studies and league. no other games are played, i will look to reset what i can, thanks

I'm experiencing the exact same problem, but I'm playing on a windows notebook. I tried all the fps issue tips from riot, but nothing changed.
It can't be the heat, since games with even higher requirements work just as usual.
There has to be some weird kind of bug.
Is your laptop overheating?  Feel the bottom of it next time and if it's too hot you may want to get a laptop fan.

The fan is often very loud and does tend to get warm yes, But this has always been the case - I've played league on it for a few months and only in the last 1/2 weeks has the FPS issue gotten very bad. After just checking the activity monitor 100% of the CPU is being used just by league....
